Pages.Name: dota_custom_game_events
Pages.Description: Used to change settings on the game mode for custom games.

Properties.Description: Name(s) of script files that are executed after all entities have spawned.
The name that other entities refer to this entity by.
Gold to award to all players each gold tick.
Time in seconds between gold ticks.
Gold players start with.
Do heroes automatically respawn?
Time in seconds for a tree to regrow.
Time in seconds for hero selection.
Time in seconds before the game begins.
Time in seconds after the game ends before the server.
Current time of day.
Scale for hero minimap icons.
Scale for creep minimap icons.
Scale for rune minimap icons.
Is first blood active?

Properties.FriendlyName: Use Base Gold Bounty On Heroes
Properties.Description: Force base gold usage instead of calculated value.
Override the camera distance.
Is this game safe to leave?
Can you buy any item from any shop?
Disable purchasing items to the stash. If disabled shops can only be used when nearby.
Mute the in-game announcers
Fixed time for heroes to respawn (or -1 to use the standard rules)
Hide multikill, streak, and first-blood banners

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptFile
InputOutputs.Description: Load and execute a script file

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptCode
InputOutputs.Description: Execute a fragment of script code

InputOutputs.Name: CallScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Call a script function

InputOutputs.Name: CallPrivateScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function from this entity's private script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: CallGlobalScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function in the global script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: Kill
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: KillHierarchy
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity and all its children from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: KillConstrained
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity, all its children, and anything constrained to it, from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: AddOutput
InputOutputs.Description: Adds an entity I/O connection to this entity. Parameter format: outputname>targetname>inputname>parameter>delay>max times to fire (-1 == infinite). Very dangerous, use with care.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser1 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser2 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser3 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser4 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser1 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser2 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser3 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser4 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnKilled
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the entity is killed and removed from the game. Parameter is the inflictor.

InputOutputs.Name: OnDayStarted
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the day starts.

InputOutputs.Name: OnNightStarted
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the night starts.

InputOutputs.Name: OnRadiantFortDestroyed
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the Radiant Ancient is destroyed.

InputOutputs.Name: OnDireFortDestroyed
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the Dire Ancient is destroyed.

InputOutputs.Name: OnGameEnded
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the game ends.

InputOutputs.Name: OnGameStarted
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when game starts.

InputOutputs.Name: SetTimeOfDay
InputOutputs.Description: Sets the time of day (0.0->1.0)

InputOutputs.Name: SetGameWinner
InputOutputs.Description: Set the winning team and end the game.

InputOutputs.Name: LevelAllHeroesUpOnce
InputOutputs.Description: Level each hero in the game up one level.

InputOutputs.Name: LevelAllHeroesToMax
InputOutputs.Description: Level each hero in the game to the max level.

InputOutputs.Name: LevelAllHeroesToLevel
InputOutputs.Description: Ensure all heroes are at least level.

InputOutputs.Name: SetStashPurchasingDisabled
InputOutputs.Description: Turn purchasing items to the stash off/on. If purchasing to the stash is off the player must be at a shop to purchase items.

InputOutputs.Name: SetFogOfWarDisabled
InputOutputs.Description: Enable or disable fog of war. When disabled all units are considered visible.

InputOutputs.Name: SetUnseenFogOfWarEnabled
InputOutputs.Description: Enable or disable unseen fog of war. When unseen fog of war is enabled parts of the map the player has never seen will be blocked out.
